definition: The word "wiedersahen" refers to the act of meeting someone again after a period of time apart. It is commonly used to describe the experience of reuniting with someone, often after a long absence or separation.

examples.german: Wir wiedersahen uns nach vielen Jahren.
examples.english: We saw each other again after many years.
They saw each other again at the train station.

examples.german: Nach dem Urlaub wiedersahen sie ihre Freunde.
examples.english: After the vacation, they saw their friends again.

examples.german: Er wiedersah seine alte Heimat nach langer Zeit.
examples.english: He saw his old hometown again after a long time.
They saw each other again to say goodbye.
